mapper.update: update tsystemlog set sUserCode = #{susercode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sUseName = #{susename,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sBankCode = #{sbankcode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sBankName = #{sbankname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sIPAddress = #{sipaddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sMACAddress = #{smacaddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sComments = #{scomments,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sLogTime = #{slogtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where sID = #{sid,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: select sID, sUserCode, sUseName, sBankCode, sBankName, sIPAddress, sMACAddress, sComments, sLogTime from tsystemlog where sID = #{sid,jdbcType=BIGINT}
select sID, sUserCode, sUseName, sBankCode, sBankName, sIPAddress, sMACAddress, sComments, sLogTime from tsystemlog
